file_insights.primary_changes: Added comprehensive godoc comments to all exported methods and types

patterns_discovered: Thread-safe concurrent map access pattern using sync.RWMutex
Shallow copy pattern for preventing external state mutation
Lock-minimizing I/O operations outside mutex scope
Consistent godoc comment style with method behavior and concurrency notes
gotchas_discovered: Potential performance overhead with deep copying data
Need for careful mutex usage to prevent deadlocks
recommendations: Consistently document concurrency characteristics in godoc comments
Implement return value documentation that explains both return values and their meanings
Consider adding examples in godoc comments to demonstrate usage
